name: Benthos Cretan Continental Shelf
description: This dataset is part of a nationalproject on the consequences of the NavarinoOil spill, in 1994 at the GialovaLagoon, Ionian Sea. The Cretancoasts were studied from May 1987, inorder to assess the level of theirenvironmental degradation due to touristic and other anthropogenic activities
